name: Punch King
description:
• Description:

PUNCH KING 1.1 is a multiplayer turn-based game. If you have watched a boxing match, you must understand the rules. Yes, this is to defeat the enemy! The game will add more features in the next version. As exciting as the movie "Real Steel"!

  • Control:

Player 1 (green):

WASD mobile, space punching

Player 2 (red):

Arrow keys to move, move to the right to punch

  • From the Triple Wolf Studio

Ricky: Game Programmer

Gary: Game mechanism Designer

Barry: Modeler, PM

Trello: https://trello.com/b/dFfzdrBY/punch-king

Source of character model from unity assets store

Source of sound from freesound
